project1.title: Statistical Data Analysis Web App
project1.desc: Perform A/B and correlation tests interactively with automatic normality detection and dynamic column selection.
project1.underConstruction: More documentation and walkthrough coming soon.

project3.title: Time-Series Predictive Analysis Dashboard
project3.desc: A dashboard for exploring time-series data, performing predictive trend analysis, and generating visual insights interactively.
techItems: Frontend: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Recharts
Backend: Python, FastAPI, yfinance, Prophet, ARIMA
Deployment: Frontend on Vercel, Backend on Render (expect ~1-2 minutes of latency on cold start)
project3.underConstruction: More documentation and walkthrough coming soon.

project2.title: Finance Tracker Web App
project2.desc: Finance tracker demo dashboard with interactive CRUD, spending analytics, and clustering insights.
techItems: Data Layer: In-memory mock data (no real database)
Deployment: Frontend on Vercel, Backend on Render (expect ~1-2 minutes of latency on cold start)
project2.underConstruction: More documentation and walkthrough coming soon.
